subject: repeating tests, configuring each iteration
msgSnippet: I d like to run the same test , testFoo() in class BarTest, many times, each time passing in a somewhat different configuration. In the excellent add-on
messageBody:
I'd like to run the same test , testFoo() in class BarTest, many times,
each time passing in a somewhat different configuration. In the excellent
add-on JUnit++, I see a ConfigurableTestCase that allows me to set a
configuration once for each test case, and a RepeatableTestCase that lets
me repeat a test, but how do I repeat tests, changing the configuration
each time? This seems so natural that someone must have written it, but I
have not seen it in JUnit, JUnit++, or JFunc.

Suggestions?

Thanks,

Joshua Fox

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
